entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 60%

Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
